TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_qurut, title = qurut, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/qurut} }

S.FORM: qurut payat kakay nya ru mha aki su kyapun ga mutux baq purung nanak ngungu nya.
qorot payat kakay nya ro mha aki so kyapon ga motox baq porong nanak ngongo nya.
